useCase.name: PacMan Game
useCase.description: A use case representing the game flow of PacMan.

mainSequence.step: User writes username in the input field.
PacMan controller gets the text from the username input field.
Username is extracted from the input field.
PacMan controller validates the entered username.
PacMan user confirms the valid username.
PacMan controller enables the start button.
User clicks on the start button.
The start button triggers the game initialization process.
PacMan controller sets the username for the game session.
PacMan controller sets the initial score for the game session.
